How to discover an Edge device: How to discover an Edge device
Connect to your Edge device using a netw: Connect to your Edge device using a network cable.
Establishing a connection may take up to: Establishing a connection may take up to a minute after the cable has been connected.
Found connected device. Setting up acces: Found connected device. Setting up access point.
The connected Edge device is used in ano: The connected Edge device is used in another space. It can only be used in one place at a time. If you move it you will remove its functionality from the other space.
It may take several minutes before all y: It may take several minutes before all your connected devices are up and running again.
You do not have permission to view the c: You do not have permission to view the connected Edge device.
The connected Edge device is set up to r: This Edge device is set up to run in another installation that you do not have access to. If this device belongs to you, please request a transition from the previous owner.
The settings in the connected Edge devic: The settings in the Edge device do not match those set in Ochno Operated. Would you like to clear the device settings to set it up again?
Resetting your Edge device may take seve: Resetting your Edge device may take several minutes and all connected devices will be temporarily unavailable. Is this ok?
There is an Edge device connected that i: There is an Edge device connected that is capable of running your automatization offline. Do you want to use the device with your current space?
This procedure might take several minute: This procedure might take several minutes and your connected devices might be temporarily unavailable during this period.
New devices connected to this Edge devic: New devices connected to this Edge device will automatically be added to the space
By removing the Edge device any offline: By removing the Edge device any offline functionality will stop working and your devices will need Internet to operate properly. Is this ok?
If your Edge device does not currently h: If your Edge device does not currently have Internet connection, it will be updated first when it has.
SSID needs to be at least 1 character: SSID needs to be at least 1 character
Password needs to be at least 8 characte: Password needs to be at least 8 characters
Resetting your Edge device will remove t: Resetting your Edge device will remove the current settings from the device and remove the connection to this space. Any offline functionality will stop working and your devices will need Internet to operate properly. This may take several minutes and all connected devices will be temporarily unavailable. Is this ok?
A connection could not be established. T: A connection could not be established. Try reconnecting your cable or resetting your hub.
Connect a usb-c cable from the hub's lef: Connect a usb-c cable from the hub's leftmost port, to your phone.
Press and hold the button on the back of: Press and hold the button on the back of your hub for 5 seconds.
If your hub is not automatically discove: If your hub is not automatically discovered:
Changing to Ethernet will restart the hu: Changing to Ethernet will restart the hub. Is this ok?
Setting WiFi will restart the hub. Is th: Setting WiFi will restart the hub. Is this ok?
Changing space will restart the hub. Is: Changing space will restart the hub. Is this ok?
Changing external hub setting will resta: Changing external hub setting will restart the hub. Is this ok?
This will reset the settings on your hub: This will reset the settings on your hub and restart. Settings you have done in Ochno Operated will not be affected. Is this ok?
The current hub is not configured to run: The current hub is not configured to run with any known cloud services. Settings might not show or function properly.
The connected cloud service is different: The connected cloud service is different from the one configured on the current hub. You will be automatically rerouted and you may need to sign in again.
Hub setup is currently only available us: Hub setup is currently only available using the Ochno Management Console.
airco2Tooltip: Carbon dioxide equivalent, a derived value from the amount of TVOC
airtvocTooltip: Total Volatile Organic Compounds - A measurement of organic components in the air
Dimmer is not controling anything. Conne: Dimmer is not controling anything. Connect the dimmer to a rule to set it up.

Control the lamps in this rule manually: Control the lamps in this rule manually by connecting them to dimmers and buttons.
Setup an automated system for the lamps: Setup an automated system for the lamps in this rule. The settings are prioritized from top to bottom.
A mechanism allows you to automate the b: A mechanism allows you to automate the behavior of your devices.
You have unsaved changes to your rules. If you leave they will be removed. Are you sure?
You have unsaved rule changes. Are you s: You have unsaved rule changes. Are you sure you want to close?
This rule has a newer version saved. Do: This rule has a newer version saved. Do you want to overwrite it with your changes?
Disabled: This rule's ports will not aut: Disabled: This rule's ports will not automatically change when adding or moving ports.
Enabled: New ports put inside the sectio: Enabled: New ports put inside the sections and positions of this rule are automatically added. Ports moved outside are removed.

You have unsaved changes. Closing will d: You have unsaved changes. Closing will discard your changes. Are you sure?
A mechanism control makes it possible fo: A mechanism control makes it possible for the user to interact with your mechanisms.
A control panel allows for a quick, simp: A control panel allows for a quick, simple and customizable way to control your devices.
Select a control scheme to get started.
A control scheme enables customization o: A control scheme enables customization of the controls the user interacts with. You can apply this control scheme to any space and changes to it will apply to any panel using it.

By setting a guest user you can allow an: By setting a guest user you can allow anyone to access the controls.
